data.comment: In the minute 0, The match has been interrupted.
The match has started.
In Washington, D.C. DC United attack through Kevin Paredes. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 1, New England have a goal kick.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
In the minute 3, Throw-in for DC United close to the penalty box.
New England needs to be cautious. DC United have an attacking throw-in.
DC United are coming forward and Edison Flores gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for New England at Audi Field.
Throw-in for New England in their own half.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 6, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Throw-in New England.
At Audi Field, DC United are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 9, In Washington, D.C. DC United's Edison Flores is caught offside.
DC United push forward at Audi Field and Ola Kamara gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined New England defence.
Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New England's half?
In the minute 11, Free kick for DC United in the half of New England.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a New England throw-in in DC United's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Russell Canouse is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Gustavo Bou of New England is pulled up for offside.
Russell Canouse returns to the field for DC United after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 20, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
Russell Canouse, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Frederic Brillant is the substitute for DC United.
In the minute 21, Guido Gonzales Jr awards the home team a throw-in.
Ola Kamara for the home team is judged to be offside.
New England's Alex Buttner gets in a shot but it is blocked by a DC United defender.
In the minute 22, Gustavo Bou gets his shot on target but fails to score for New England.
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
New England pushes forward through Gustavo Bou, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to New England.
Gustavo Bou scores to make it 0-1 at Audi Field.
New England have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards DC United a goal kick.
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to DC United.
DC United to take a throw-in in New England territory.
In the minute 35, Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
New England have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
New England's Kelyn Rowe gets in a shot on goal at Audi Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to New England.
Teal Bunbury scores with a header and the away team increase their lead to 0-2.
Great play from Alex Buttner to set up the goal.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for DC United in the half of New England.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Can New England capitalize from this throw-in deep inside DC United's half?
New England have a dangerous throw-in.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
In the minute 43, Guido Gonzales Jr awards the away team a throw-in.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to DC United.
In the minute 45, Important block from the New England defence as Felipe Martins fires in a strike for DC United.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Washington, D.C..
DC United's Ola Kamara is whistled for offside at Audi Field.
In the minute 45, Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
DC United to take a throw-in in New England territory.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The first-half has come to a close in Washington, D.C..
The second-half has commenced. DC United with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
Throw-in for New England in their own half.
In the minute 48, Brandon Bye for New England gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards DC United a goal kick.
Felipe Martins for DC United drives towards goal at Audi Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 48, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for DC United, close to New England's area.
Throw-in New England.
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in high up the field for DC United in Washington, D.C..
Throw-in DC United.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick DC United.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for New England in Washington, D.C..
In the minute 53, Guido Gonzales Jr awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
In the minute 55, Free kick DC United.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Edison Flores for DC United who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 58, Ulises Segura (DC United) has replaced the possibly injured Edison Flores.
The home team replace Joseph Mora with Yamil Asad.
Guido Gonzales Jr blows against DC United's Ulises Segura for offside.
In the minute 60, Can New England capitalize from this throw-in deep inside DC United's half?
New England have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, New England have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Corner awarded to New England.
Adam Buksa (New England) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for DC United at Audi Field.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Washington, D.C., Julian Gressel of DC United is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 65, Free kick for DC United in the half of New England.
Throw-in for New England close to the penalty box.
Steve Birnbaum (DC United) has received a yellow card from Guido Gonzales Jr.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 68, Scott Caldwell is replacing Kelyn Rowe for the away team.
DC United have been awarded a penalty in Washington, D.C....
In the minute 72, Ola Kamara's spot-kick reduces the deficit 1-2.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to New England.
Corner awarded to New England.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
DC United have a dangerous throw-in.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to DC United.
Corner awarded to New England.
In Washington, D.C., Teal Bunbury (New England) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Felipe Martins.
In the minute 82, DC United's Felipe Martins looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Scott Caldwell New England.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to DC United.
In the minute 85, Free kick New England.
New England make their second substitution with Diego Fagundez replacing Gustavo Bou.
Throw-in for New England in the half of DC United.
In the minute 89, Free kick for New England in their own half.
Ola Kamara (DC United) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
New England have a goal kick.
10 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
New England have a goal kick.
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for DC United in the half of New England.
Throw-in for New England at Audi Field.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a New England throw-in in DC United's half.
Throw-in DC United.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
DC United's Steve Birnbaum misses with an attempt on goal.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards New England a goal kick.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards the home team a throw-in.
In Washington, D.C. New England drive forward through Tajon Buchanan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for New England, close to DC United's area.
Can New England capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a New England throw-in in DC United's half.
That's full-time at Audi Field. The final score is 1-2.
Federico Higuain is on a sub for Frederic Brillant for DC United.
DeJuan Jones is replacing Alex Buttner for the away team.
The away team replace Cristian Penilla with Tajon Buchanan.
Adam Buksa (New England) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
DC United's Felipe Martins has been booked in Washington, D.C..
